name: Living dead is no excuse!
description:
This is an independent game that tells the story of the Mr. Rizzoto pizzeria and its delivery, Jimbo, it would be normal if there were no living dead in the street!

Directional arrows move the character, Z shot, ESC returns to the main menu, ENTER on some screens (eg menu).

The game was all built in 64x64 resolution to participate in the LowrezJam 2016.

Good game!

Credits

Fabio Manna [ DotChaos ] - Game Design, Graphics, Level Design
Evandro Gomes [ Fuzenrad ] - Game Design, Programmer
